mapper.select: select orderID, companyName, username, orderDate, remark, flag from purchase_order p, suppliers s, user_list u where p.supplierID = s.supplierID and p.employeeID = u.employeeID limit #{0}, #{1}
select productName, purchasePrice, quantity, totalPrice from purchase_order_detail detail, products where orderID = #{0} and detail.productID = products.productID
mapper.delete: delete p,d from purchase_order p left join purchase_order_detail d on p.orderID = d.orderID where p.orderID = #{0}
mapper.update: update purchase_order set flag = #{0} where orderID = #{1}
